detaileddescription.para:
Create of copy of this table.
Must be implemented by any derived class!

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t column_index, const size_t row_index=0, const table_id_t table_id=0) const
memberdef.name: metadataAt

detaileddescription.para:
Get the metadata for a certain column. Returns a pointer to a ColumnMetadata object for a specified column.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
column
Column for which to return the metadata.
row
Row in that column (default=0).
table_id
ID of the table from which to extract (default=0).

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t column, const size_t row=0, const table_id_t table_id=0, const bool of_delta=false) const
memberdef.name: dictionaryAt

detaileddescription.para:
Get the dictionary for a certain column.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
column
Column from which to extract the dictionary.
row
Row in that column (default=0).
table_id
ID of the table from which to extract (default=0).

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t column, const table_id_t table_id) const
memberdef.name: dictionaryByTableId

detaileddescription.para:
Get the dictionary for a certain column by table ID.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
column
Column from which to extract the dictionary.
table_id
ID of the table from which to extract.

memberdef.argsstring: (AbstractTable::SharedDictionaryPtr dict, const size_t column, const size_t row=0, const table_id_t table_id=0)
memberdef.name: setDictionaryAt

detaileddescription.para:
Sets the dictionary for a certain column.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
dict
Dictionary to be used.
column
Column for which to set the dictionary.
row
Row in that column (default=0).
table_id
ID of the table (default=0).

Returns the number of rows in the table
Must be implemented by any derived class!

Returns the number of columns.
Must be implemented by any derived class!

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t column, const size_t row) const
memberdef.name: getValueId

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the value-ID of a cell.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
column
Column number of the cell.
row
Row number of the cell.

Returns the number of slices.
Must be implemented by any derived class!

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t slice, const size_t row) const
memberdef.name: atSlice

detaileddescription.para:
Returns a pointer to the memory area of a slice.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
slice
The slice of interest.
row
Row in that slice.
_width

Returns the width of a slice.
Must be implemented by any derived class!
slice
The slice of interest.

memberdef.argsstring: (const size_t column, const size_t row) const
memberdef.name: printValue

parameterdescription.para: Column of the cell containing the value.
Row of the cell containing the value.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the number of horizontal subtables.
Must be implemented by any derived class!

memberdef.argsstring: (const field_list_t *fields=nullptr, const bool reuse_dict=false, const size_t initial_size=0, const bool with_containers=true) const
memberdef.name: copy_structure
